Allows an alternate code slot name in the attribute.
---
{"codeSlot":"here-goes-the-code"}
---
<vue-component-doc code-slot="another-code-slot">Hallo</vue-component-doc>
---
<vue-component-doc-prism language="html">
  <template v-slot:another-code-slot>Hallo</template>
  <template v-slot:result>Hallo</template>
</vue-component-doc-prism>
